text: The Angola national futsal team represents Angola in international futsal. They have qualified for the 2021 FIFA Futsal World Cup in Lithuania and the 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup in Uzbekistan. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA Futsal World Cup record
